content.detailedDescription: Me and two other friends were leaving my house to go to a convenience store at 8 pm. it was completely dark outside, and we noticed an object that we have seen before in the sky. it appeared to be a bright orb floating about in the sky. its light puslasted slowly at different intensities, and clearly was not a star. it moved to many different positions in the night sky. it observed no typical aerial movement attributed to planes of helicopters. it just floated around for hours! long enough to have one of my buddies with a high quality camera to come over and photograph and videotape it after we came back from the convenience store. (these photos will be emailed to a mufon investigator when i get them later today.) meanwhile, about 5-10 minutes into our drive towards the wawa in charlotte hall, we observed three of the same orbs in a triangular formation about halfway up the size of a cell phone tower like this one *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg) in the sky. these objects then exhibited the odd behavior of producing smaller red lights that, then floated up into the sky. after this, the objects dissapeared one after another. (another friend in another place in the county was observing the same object and reported them to dissapear at the same time i saw my glowboys dissapear.) at least 5 people witnessed this event from different locations. when we returned to my house, we proceeded in photographing the inital object we saw. i did not lose sight of the object, as last time, and ended up just going to bed a few hours later. i can provide names and contact information of the other witnesses, as they would be glad to validate this claim.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Two stange sightings observed by 5+ people. first one is a similar object from a previous sighting. odd bringht orbs in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Tried to take photo
content.summary: Square large object ,,,neast pacific palisades above pch

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday, february 3, 2011 8:45 pm central time crivitz, wisconsin, marinette county
i noticed the sky was very clear and the stars were very bright. one star looked extra bright so i got the binoculars and looked at the star. it started to change shape and color. 
three distinct shapes it made are:
1.	jellyfish with long dangling tentacles reaching earthward.
2.	a large round shaped diamond with red lights around the perimeter and over the top surface of the diamond.
3.	a face with eyes and a mouth that moved as if speaking and the expression seemed stern.
the star object continued to change shape and moved further away and came closer to earth. it seemed to move with the earth���s rotation in a westward direction. 
there was a second star in the west out over our marsh area and it was much closer to the earth and had a dimmer light shining from it than the first star described here. it also appeared to change its shape when viewed through binoculars. this object moved closer to the first star in a south east direction.
my mom, dad and sister viewed the stars and i called into the marinette sheriff���s department. they sent an officer over to investigate. he thought it was something but could not determine what it was.
at times the object looked web like or faceted like a diamond with a hole in the center. it would change into a disk like figure and tip to the side so that one would see the edge as if looking at the edge of a coin.  it had white and blue and red lights around its perimeter that moved and changed.
i have not heard of any weather satellites that change colors and shapes.
last summer, 2010 my mother and i viewed a ufo hovering just above the tree tops over our pond and marsh area. there are no houses in that area for miles and no one ever goes into the marsh. it is to the west of our home. it was oval shaped and had white lights all around the edge. it danced and tipped itself on edge and the lights changed colors of white, red and blue. it shot a white beam of light just over my head as i was standing outside viewing it. i noticed it at about the same time and for the same length of time.  it had numerous claw-like feet around the edge of the oval shape that looked like landing feet. they were not sharp but flat and shaped like a gold bar with a half gold bar size and shape for the under joint foot pad part. it seemed to be white in color or silver white.
the odd thing is that our satellite tv and internet were not working. it was a clear night and there should not have been any disturbances from the weather.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Circle,   Diamond,   Disc,   Oval,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Change its shape  and color extra bright

content.detailedDescription:
Give me a moment to explain from the start... i had a sighting back on dec 15th, 2010 of a triangle flying over my house. (mufon report #27109) since then, i have been watching the sky hoping to see it again, and to have a witness this time.

monday night at 2110 hrs i was on my front porch having a cigarette and spotted this white light in the area that appeared to be above cupertino, ca about 5-7 miles away. i noticed that this was in no way a plane, chopper, or star and just watched it. i looked away for about two minutes, and when i looked back, it was gone.

last night, i went out front again at the same time, and there it was again. this time, it looked to be in the same area, but about 1/2 mile south from first location. this time i wanted to know for sure what it was and was going to get my telescope out and check. right then this strange guy came walking through my complex and started checking out cars, so out of safety i focused on him and alerted my husband. we were concentrating on this guy for about four minutes and when i remembered about the light i looked back up and it was gone.

that brings us to tonight. at about 1800 hrs i was on my back patio and noticed alot of military choppers flying around. i wondered if my friend was back, but blew it off. 

i went out front at 2050 hrs and you got it... there it was again. this time i was not going to let it get away. i got my telescope out right away and focused on it. i couldn't believe it. i was looking at a triangle/"v" with red and white lights on it. i called *(name removed--cms/sg) (my hubby) to look at it and be my witness and verify that i am not turing into some kind of ufo junky. he couldn't believe what he was seeing. he said that he was also seeing the triangle/"v" with the red, and white lights. he said he also saw amber lights on it. we are 100% sure of what we saw. i kept it on the scope and we just kept taking turns looking at it. he tried taking pictures of it on his camera, but with the low battery and trying to get it through the tele, he doesn't believe he captured it, just a blur. (he will check pics 2/3/11) both *(name removed--cms/sg and i are able to draw detailed pictures, scan them, and email them if mufon is interested. it didn't seem to be moving at all, just hovering about the cupertino area. during all this, helicopters seemed to be flying over it, right by it, and just staying near the object.

at 2109 hrs the lights turned off and was not viewable with the naked eye. however, i was still able to see it clearly through the tele. i watched it until about 2115 hrs when i gave up because it seemed to be moving toward the south (ocean) and was only a blurry blob on the tele.

i came back in and saw that [name removed cms/dr] was already sketching what he saw onto paper. i then sketched what i saw right underneath it. after that i kept looking out the window to see if i could get lucky twice in the same night. at 2130 hrs i noticed two helicopters flying fast overhead from the santa cruz mountains towards moffit field. i heard them and within a second of each other they turned their lights on. why did they have their lights off before this point of flight? they were making a mad dash back to the base. were they chasing the object? i found that interesting. i watched for another minute or two when two more choppers came out of nowhere and went to the area where the object was hanging out. i think the military was chasing it and investigating whatever it was. 

since this was the third night in a row, is it going to come back tomorrow? i hope so! i will have the batteries charged for the camera, and my video camera. i will keep you all posted. for any of you who are curious, i live near good samaritan hosp, so from that area, start looking at around 8:45 pm towards cupertino. i am hoping to see it appear as i have missed it's great entrance for the third time in a row.
content.summary: 3rd night of triangle sighting, same location & time

content.detailedDescription:
I was helping guide a motorcycle trip and taking photos of the riders, shortly before amboy ca, which is a pretty sparsely populated area. i took a bunch of pictures, and was viewing them to add to our website today. this is the first time i noticed the anomaly in the upper right hand corner.

i have a raw version of this photo, quite large and unaltered in any way. this is the only photo where the object appears and i thought it interesting as it has motion blur and is in the distance. i did not see it at the time as i was focused on the subject, but it looks an awful lot to me like a moving oval object off in the distance - an airplane would not blur this way.

i am a professional photographer.
content.summary: Took this photograph and did not look at it closely until today. check out the upper right hand corner.

content.detailedDescription: I was camping on my families property with cousins just looking out over the lake at the stars i often do this when an object appeared over the lake not directly over it but not as high as an airplane or crop duster  it had lights green and red blinking on and off like its going around in a circle then another one appeared not to far from it on the left same shape could have been its twin it began to "shoot" what appeared to be a light beam red deep red in color after that i told my cousins to get in the van and we hid the rest of the night my first thought was a helicopter but there was no noise i believe it was on the front page of the news paper the sturgis journal if i recall others saw it
content.summary: 2 round objects with green and red lights

content.detailedDescription:
My husband woke up in the middle of the night from a terrifying dream that was so bizarre that he had to write it down.. he titled it "liquid city" he wrote: we were all together riding in a small boat going down a channel of a lake when we felt this feeling over us that we were gonna have to go.. all of us.. all 5 of us. we were going faster down the channel when it came to a halt- the craft.. there were small aliens standing next to like a small cave where a small channel of water went down. they were motioning us to go in. i remember them trying to pull me in. evidently everyone else was pulled in but they were trying to pull me. i remember them talking to me in my mind and i remember them being really strong and taking a hold of me thrusting me back. i gave it all i had by fighting and i was making them mad. i felt lifeless as they just pulled me in. i know they knew everyone of my thoughts. big headed and ugly but had quite a sense of humor about them they were letting us know that they were waiting for us.
my husband told me that after writing this he calmed back down and tried to fall asleep. he got up early that morning finding my 10 year old son telling him that he saw a big oval shaped light in our back field around 6am. my son told my husband that it was bright red and danced around by the trees then disappeared. my husband chose not to tell him about the dream. my son went back to bed..Later my 15 year old daughter woke stating that she had a weird dream that involved tornados and aliens.. totally weird and really began to upset my husband to the point that he didn't want to talk about it anymore.  
i wanted write this to find out if anyone else experienced this kind of vivid dream. it is disturbing enough but to find that 2 of the 3 kids vocalized a link to this situation. very weird.
content.summary: Dream with weird coincidence

content.detailedDescription: Letting the dog out, seen bright object in the western sky, thinking it was a star, but didn't hear of one being in the sky that night, thinking it could be venus, but don't know for sure........It's either gone now, or if it was a star, it clouded over when i went back to look....
content.summary: Bright, bright~star like

content.detailedDescription:
My ex- husband and i were coming from elpaso to pick up my things i had left in lovington n.M. i wasnt to familiar with the route to elpaso since i spent most of my life in lovington and left to midland where i married my husband. from there we moved to mexico near elpaso tx. so then we separated and decided to give it one more try. so i had gone back to him. so we had to pick up somrthings i had left behind and he'd ask me what was the fast way to lovington and i stated i didnt know i said maybe thru artesia n.M. "we came thru carlsbad " so he said ok and as we traveled to lovington thru artiesia we arrived at loco hills just shortly leaving loco 
hills we seamed to have problems with the truck as seen on movies but i thought he just wanted attention he said to me "hey something is wrong with the truck i step on the gas peddle and the truck seems to be going by itself " i thought oh well its still going everything should be ok and then he says "hey whats happening to the music the radios going crazy" so we just turned it off. well a minute later he said hey am i dreaming and i  said to my self no this is a real nitemare cause i didnt want to back to him. but i said no why and he said dont be scared and pinch my hand so i did and he said this is not adream and he pinched my hand and he said look outside my window and tell me what you see. and sure enough i cant explain how i felt but there it was a ufo as we know it. a silver disc on my left side to his window. it was sightly bigger than the mini truck we were in. it made no noise had no markings and followed us for a few minutes and then disappeared. well we were stunned and dazed. well afew minutes later iwas looking for it and torwards caprock there it was i thought floating over the mountains a huge disc hovering as we drove. well i kept watch at it and we entered maljamar it got closer as we went on top of the hill the curve as we went on the top to the left side to my eyes a great huge mothership by the road not sure maybe 30ft or less in the air a gait ufo, no lights no noise, no letters or markings. a silver color although it cameflaudged from the plains of the ground. it just stood there for a few minutes then just dissapered.
content.summary: Mother ship 30 ft in air from ground appro.

content.detailedDescription:
Hey guys, i live in san diego, ca and every other night between 1am and 3am i see, facing west, a small bright star-like ball in the sky outside my window. i know its not a planet or a satellite because of the way it moves. its slow... but i've seen it move as fast as a plane flying would be, but then suddenly it stops dead. the first night i saw this about a month ago, there was 2 star-like things in the night sky. its not a helicopter because sometimes it stays still for quite awhile and is far enough away that a helicopters light probably wouldn't be visible, i believe this object to be over the pacific ocean somewhere. ive seen it fade out and then come back, and get a little bigger and a little brighter as though it was slightly closer as it was at first glance. its slightly larger then regular stars, first time i saw it i thought it was the north star, but over the ocean?? i don't think so. it also flickers very brightly, and it flickers blue, red, and green. i've used binoculars to get a better look, but its far enough away that it just looks like a large star flashing weird colors. it stays for usually 10 or 15 mins usually and then drops behind the horizon of some apartment buildings across the street from me, very slowly. i've been out in the desert plenty of times and seen satellites, shooting stars, planes, jets, and helicopters. i've thought of everything i possibly could think of and can rule out every one. can anyone help shed some light on this weird sighting? i know i'm not seeing things because i've had my girlfriend and parents both look at it. ive tried to take pictures and a video of it but my stupid camera wont focus on it. also, ive seen it move, like i said its really slow but it does move up, down, left, right. so i am completely stumped as to what the hell i'm seeing. if anyone has any info on government satellites or ha ha "weather balloons" i would love some feed back.
before i'm willing to accept my info to be sent to a third party. i would like if i can speak to someone via email. i mean if someone tells me what i'm seeing isn't worth it then no third party is necessary. if someone contacts me through my email and tells me they think i can make a case, then i'd be willing to let my info go to a third party.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Every other night occurance

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from denver ( i am a truck driver) on i-76 eastbound,i was passing through keenesburg, it was already dark, when i noticed a triangle shaped object moving very very slow, no noise. the points of the triangle were gently rounded and there was 1 light at each point for a total of 3. it was not a plane, too slow moving, and i have never seen a helicopter that shaped. i only noticed it because of the light formation and it was not very high up in altitude.  it was moving from the northeast to the southwest across i-76. i was a little scared and was trying to look up out of the window, when i realizied what it was and almost went of the road.
content.summary: Triangle shape moving very, very slowly over keenesburg, co

content.detailedDescription: On february 1st of 2011 at around 9:30-10pm cst in hoffman estates,il my friend and i were traveling westbound on route 58 (golf rd), near a heavily wooded forest (forest preserve) during a terrible blizzard. as we were driving, suddenly we witnessed a bright l.E.D blue flash of light that seemed to come from our right side. the flash of blue light remained for about 3 seconds. it surrounded the whole area to where the high winds of the snow were no longer visible, as the bright glow surrounded us completely and engulfed the whole car in this light, which is the brightest we had ever encountered.  we never experienced anything like it.  it was so startling that the car in front of us stopped dead in his tracks. we almost rear ended him and could have also caused a collision with the cars following us from behind as well.  thank goodness we didn't get stuck in the foot high snow that was on the ground at the time.  i'd also like to state that as intense as the light was, i have ruled out the possibilites that it could have been lightning, or a meteorite as there was no sound of thunder following the bright flash, or any sonic booms, or vibrations in the ground.  we have no idea what else this could've been.  we were left feeling confused and struggling with the idea of what it could've been, or what could've caused that.  there was nothing else we saw that night.
content.summary: Bright blue flash of light hoffman estates il

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at the computer in the kitchen(which looks into my back yard) reading the news online when the most brilliant and beautiful blue/green light lit up my backyard. it only lasted a few seconds, but it made me feel warm and was the most gorgeous thing i had ever seen in my life. it reminded me of water you see on resort brochures. it was so pretty! afterwards i just felt this longing to see it again. i still feel that way.
content.summary: Blue green light filled sky

content.detailedDescription:
These were strange contrails unlike i've ever seen before.

i was in the back yard trying to photograpth the domed radar plane flying
over at low altitude.After i got a picture of it i noticed the strange contrails in the sky.I took four pictures of it and watched it for about 15 minutes.By that time the trails were gone.  *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) florida

ps: i didn't see any aircraft associated with the trails.
content.summary: Unusual contrails in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My husband noticed 3 orange lights in the distance, above the horizon, moving in strange back and forth patterns.  i saw them too.  about 2 miles away?  then they all hovered for a few seconds.  one of the orange lights started moving straight up as if in a line, until it disappeared.  the other two lights stayed low on the horizon and when the 1st vanished, the 2nd light ascended, following the path of the first straight up into the sky.  then the 3rd followed, exactly the same path.  it took about 1.5-2 minutes for each to ascend completely out of view.  then we walked another block and saw a 4th orange light hover, waver back and forth, then ascend in a straight line.  we were excited and curious.  not scared.
content.summary: Round orange lights

content.detailedDescription:
I took my dog out to do her business out in the backyard around 11:20 p.M. as we walked out on to the porch, i noticed two very bright lights in the southwestern sky. a few minutes later i saw they had not moved and now a third light was flickering, as if it were one of those new "energy safe" light bulb just turning on. they made no noise and sat still in their triangle like formation. 
i immediately run in the house and grabbed my camcorder to document what was happening. i had a hard time keeping the lights in frame as they were also quite low, and view was often obstructed by trees. so i got my ladder and went on my roof to film. i sat in awe watching and filming the amber/orange colored orbs for next 17 minutes until they began to change shape, almost appearing like a helicopter before flying away one by one. i uploaded my video to youtube right away that same night.
around 30 minutes after the last orb vanished into the night, two helicopters (i assume police) began to sweep the area in the direction they were headed as they disappeared. this sweep lasted almost an hour, then returned again the following night repeating the actions performed the night of the event.
content.summary: Three bright orbs in a triangle formation strobing and pulsating silent 17 min.

content.detailedDescription: About 1:am i was outside in my patio smoking a cig.Talking on the phone on a long distance call for about five minutes when my call was disconected suddendly. i stood up to put my cig. out when i noticed a bright light up in the sky. i stared at it to see if it was moving or questioning if it was just a street light. then i noticed this very bright light was moving rather slow. as it got closer i was then trying to figure out if it was an airplane but it wasn't an airplane at all. the lights were too bright to be an airplane and it was flying too low. i thought an airplane wouldn't be flying that low. as it passed by me appox. (the same height as an airplane) it passed slow but it took about  a minute to pass before the building obstructed my view. it had greenish blueish white lights on the front shaped like a v but appeared to also be circular on the sides. it passed slow and the sound coming from it was a humming sound. only way i know how to discribe it. when i first noticed it i thought it cant be a street light because it's too high and it cant be a plane because it's too low and lights are too bright. my feelings were omg it's a ufo spaceship & i reached for my cell phone to take a picture of it but it wasn't on me i was using the land line. then i realized that may have been the reason my call was disconnected (my calls have never been disconected like this before) i went inside the condo to wake my adult daughter & let her know what i had seen and wanted her to see it from her bedroom window. by the time she saw it, it was already up higher in the sky hovering over one area & it appeared to be north from me. i decided to call 911 to find out if there were other reports made about this and the dispatcher said no one else had called to report anything about this. i thought it irather strange that no one else would call to inquire about it because the lightss were so bright and (it is my assumption that it was flying too low to be an airplane) finelly around 2:am we lost sight of it and no longer hovering in the sky. wow this was trippy. i didn't feel scared or nervous but felt more of a sense of disbelief of what i was seeing. when i called 911 it was then (as i was discribing it) that i began to feel more shook up. i am so glad my daughter found this web site. i needed confirmation of what i saw by reading other reports here about the same object with the same lights was real and true  by knowing someone else saw it did set my mind at ease knowing i wasn't immagining this.
content.summary: 1 am northern ca. bright  greenish blueish white bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, check this out, not sure if you have seen this yet?  object taken by 3 video cameras all at the same time.

one close up and the two other at some distance (not sure if real or fake)

check out this ufo videos over a temple in israel.
 
the first one is a close up from a tourist's video or camera
 
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
 
and the second video is of the same object some distance away but caught on two different cameras
 
*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
 
it looked real to me and listent to the reaction of the people in the back ground make sounds of wonderment
content.summary: Look at ufo video hovering over an israel temple, not sure if real

content.detailedDescription: About 150 am was smoking a cig had my window open(blowing smoke out window)noticed a very bright light inside the clouds,about the same time power went out as light went over home and around the area the power came back on after light went further away.Alarms to the local biz went off,all of them cops even howed up to the alarms,never saw an object,just bright light holy crap how bright it was,power was out aprox 2 minas light pased over.Felt very at ease when i saw it.
content.summary: Holy crap

content.detailedDescription: It was about 2-3 after midnight. i went outside to smoke a cig and after 10 minutes. i heard a low pitch sound like a slow one cylinder engine, .It was pitch dark. i looked to the south and  above me at a angle of 12 degrees and about 100 yards away, three lights were moving from east to west above the valley below.The valley is  small and directly behind the house facing south. the lights were about the size of a quarter held out arms distance and were only half circle.They moved very slow around 4 mph.The lights moved along the valley for less than about half mile until i lost sight of it because it was so low. i could not see anything between the lights. the lights were bright but didn't light up anything but the lights themself. it was the sound which attracted my attention the whole time.It was moving so slow it took about 6 minutes from start to finish. the lights were contained and not seperate. this makes the second sighting i have had. the other was in okla. city,ok. the sound there was a very high pitch sound, it was about a blook away and about 200ft above the ground over a public park near my home. it remained in a still position for about 5 minutes. i could see it very plain, it was circular and had a dome on top.At first i thought it was a toy someone was playing with at the park. it was silver in color. i could describe it more but it would take to much time here.
content.summary: 3 half dome lights on bottom in triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what it was but was flying lower than everything in the sky. object was flashing red and white lights that were brighter than everything else. could not see the shape of the object since it was close to dusk. incredible!
content.summary: Object flying over city slow moving and very low. red and white flashing lights brighter than all airplanes and helicopters passed by 2 airports

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the garbage around 5:25 pm on 12/31/2010 in anchorage alaska within a few blocks of the intersection of debarr and bragaw streets. i noticed a really bright orange light to the east at about 20 to 30 degrees above the horizon and called for my wife to see it too. it was slowly approaching with a steady motion along a straight line in my general direction. when it got to about a 45 degree angle above the horizon, it continued to move slowly but changed course moving to my left. at the same time the light slowly went out while maintaing the same intensity.  it was like i was looking at a bright fuzzy surface that maintained it's intensity and the amount of surface i was watching slowly went to zero.  at this point i could just make out a faint small oval shape that continued moving to the left. after traveling a total distance of about 20 degrees to the left, it changed course again and continued slowly moving away from me.  it finally was obscured by the  roof of a building about 100 yards to my east. there are really tall mountains to the east that go way above the roof of this building, so it had to be betwwen me and the mountains. total duration was about 5 minutes.  my wife has seen military flares and was certain this was not a flare.  she said flares don't make u-turns.  the head lights and running lights of airplanes are usually not orange. the intensity was greater than any airplane headlights i have observed and there was no discernable aircraft engine noise. there must have been other witnesses. i could hear a lot of neighberhood fireworks.  maybe the occupants wanted a better view of the fireworks :-) i regret not thinking to signal it with a laser pointer.
content.summary: Bright orange light slowly made a u-turn, went dim, had oval shape

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i have had a morning tradition for almost a decade of having coffee without artificial lighting so we can enjoy the stars when possible or perhaps an occasional owl.  we sit typically for about 20-30 minutes around 5:30am before getting ready for work. we sit at a window overlooking a man-made pond and greenbelt beyond that. we know what to expect to see of our wintertime north-facing sky and terrain.

this morning we saw a very bright, planet-like, light in the northwest sky which reflected in the pond. it had a periodic reddish/orange light and what seemed to be an occasional faint aqua-colored light. we assumed it was a plane enroute to seatac airport, but it never moved. we also considered that perhaps it was a plane moving away from us on a direct bearing towards the northwest.  what made no sense to us was why we would be able to detect a red light at such a distance for so long a time.  either it should fade away as it left or land at seatac, but a red light could not possibly stay the same; it would have been enormous at such a long distance had it been moving away from us, and unlike any planes we've ever seen with their running lights. 

we drank two cups of coffee and still it seemed not to have moved.  by about 5:50ish we realized that it had dropped a little towards the horizon and was positioned more centrally north.  we were able to look at it through binoculars the whole time, but never saw a solid object, only the lights.

i wished that i could have stayed with it to watch it as the sun came up, but we had to get ready for work. by the time i left today at 6:20am, it was still there. my husband has an engineering background and did not want to talk about it and, in fact, seemed a little irritated, i think because there was no logical explanation for what we were looking at. for us, it certainly was an unidentified moving "object" just not sure if it were flying or not.

as a small epilogue to this narrative, while driving to work, it was still very dark, the sky brilliant and the air cold and dry.  to the south over tiger mountain, i could see an unusually bright planet, probably saturn or jupiter? not sure, but it's about the right location where we would see those planets.
content.summary: Bright star or planet-like white light plus periodic red/orange/bluish light in northwest sky

content.detailedDescription:
Field investigator #12885 is submitting this report for the witness.

the witness's very large german-shepherd dog was very nervous after midnight some evening around thanksgiving, november, 2010, so the witness let her dog outside on her patio at her home in campo seco, california.  it was a very clear night, extremely dark out, no moon.  
she witnessed several ufos filling the sky, which scared her.  
she thought it was an invasion!
there were a dozen or more craft, which were each approximately 300' tall, and 100' wide at the base.  each craft was surrounded on the periphery with 30 to 50 flickering white-orange lights, which outlined the shape of the craft.  the shape of each craft reminded her of an upside-down coffee-mug.
they were extremely large, and were close to the ground (below aircraft height). the craft moved in a formation pattern slowly circling, and some of them moved down towards a water pond nearby, while the rest remained in formation.  she doesn't know if any landed or not.  there was a flash of white light, and the craft were then motionless, and just hovered.  the craft were completely silent, no sound at all.
her dog was extremely nervous the whole time.
after 5 minutes of witnessing the formation from her patio, the witness went inside her house to call her daughter who lives nearby. her daughter answered her phone and went outside to see if she could also see the craft. her daughter returned to the phone to tell her mother that she could see nothing but a dark sky. the witness hung up and went back outside, but the craft had disappeared and were no longer there.
per my request, the witness snail-mailed to me (fi# 12885) a sketch of what she saw, and i have attached that sketch to this report.
i also have a 16 minute 52 second digital recording of my telephone conversation with the witness on 1/28/2011, and a 35 minute digital recording of my conversation with the witness on 1/18/2011, which are not attached to this report, but which i will keep.
(the daughter of this witness also has submitted an earlier different ufo report #27109 was has been assigned to me, fi# 12885.)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dozen or more 300' tall upside-down coffee-mug shaped ufos with 20-50 white-orange lights surrounding each craft, which filled the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Object sighted on 1-30-11 at approximately 5:39 am cst it was a faint white star-like object.  it appeared to be moving faster than a satellite, and much faster than an aircraft.  first sighted at 90 degrees elevation, moving from west to east.  disappeared after a sighting duration of abut 40 seconds in the east at about 30 degrees elevation.  it covered about 60 degrees of azimuth.  why am i seeing these things??  they must be objects that are known, just some that i am not familiar with.  after 3-4 thousand hours of flight time, you would think that i would be pretty familiar with the sky and what is in it
content.summary: It was a faint white star-like object.  it appeared to be moving faster than a satellite

content.detailedDescription:
At just before 8pm last night, 1/31/11, i very clearly saw two objects with four distinctly round, brightly colored lights: blue, reddish-pink, green and a yellow.  the lights were so bright they immediately caught my attention and were very easy to follow in the night.  
 
i was driving north on i-5 about to exit arena blvd.  at first, i mistook them for a weird air show off to my right over sacramento's arco arena, just south of the sacramento intl. airport, but when the objects wandered from the very large parking lot and followed a road across an empty field from me i realized they were not kites, remote controlled planes, nor any other plane for that matter.  they were a block away and at one point flew under the lights of the empty street. the ships apeared to be black under the orange street lights. i thought they were only v shaped, but at times they appeared triangular, but as though they had slightly extended rear sides.  
 
it looked as if the ���drivers��� were having fun, travelling slowly along the road, twirling, rising up, stopping and hovering, and sometimes rolling in another direction (blatantly defying the laws of physics).  they stayed between nearly touching ground and 100ft in the air.  i live near an airport, i know how planes move, and these were not planes.  i can best describe their movement as a mix of that of a kite and a stunt bi-plane. one of them flew under a red light in an empty intersection, while the other flew over.  in relation to the size of the traffic light pole, they were between 20-30ft wide and 3-4 ft tall. 

i was never affraid of them, rather jealous that they seemed to be so much fun to fly.
 
they were traveling south toward the convergence of two freeways, i-5 and i-80, the busy truxel shopping center, and on toward downtown sacramento.  i know they must have been seen by other people as well. being so unexplainable, i was surprised they were so blatantly visible. 

since i was exiting the freeway, i had slowed as much as i could while constantly looking to my right, but as they travelled further behind me i could no longer safely watch them unless i pulled over.  not having a camera on me and with a hungry child in the back seat unfortuantly i could not pull over to watch them completley disapear.  

did anyone else see these??
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Two v shaped flying objects with 4 bright, multicolored lights followed a road and stayed 100ft from the ground

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday january 29th at approximately 8 pm i was looking at the sky as it was fairly clear when i noticed to my southeast a stationary object in the sky.I recorded it on video however video is bouncy as i tried to steady against a tree but back to the ufo.
it just remained still but it was projecting all colors from it in a very rapid fashion.
i am sending in video to you.
i watched it in the sky for at least an hour.
i also noticed a blue sphere like object just below it.(have photos of both)
after watching for so long i started to look around in the sky.
that was when i noticed a jet at a high cruising altitude and to the left of it a red to brown colored sphere seamed to be following same direction as jet.(to my north)
i had my bright led flashlight with me with a strobe function on it so i flashed my light towards the object.
i was then shocked to see the object(or ufo)switch it's direction.
it circled back for a few seconds,and then it just went in the opposite direction back north again.
i went back to look at flashing ufo as it was still there.
i stopped watching when my wife came home upset(we have been caring for my father who has cancer).
later i looked out of the living room window and it was still out there only in a short but different position.
lost sight of object when i went to bed.
saturday was a very strange night.
content.summary: Ufos over tulsa county

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i witnessed two spherical lights, one white and one red, swoop down across the sky in the south from right to left at a high rate of speed. we lost sight of them after they passed behind a tree. the red sphere was behind and to the left of the white one as if flying in formation. they moved from sw to ne and began flying upward just before our view was blocked by the tree. we both lost sight of them at that point. the spheres appeared to be about twice the size of the star betelgeuse which was visible at the time. the sky was clear. we didn���t hear any sound.
content.summary: White and red spheres over clearwater fl

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving north down keeney street, just past bushy hill road in manchester and noticed what looked like a flare in the sky. it was overcast and no stars could be seen. i rolled down the window to get a better look and saw that it was 4 glowing lights in a diamond shape. i was driving about 35-40 mph and the lights we traveling approx. northeast and a bit slower. i realized then i had no idea what this was because there was no sound. not sure how high it was flying, but just below the clouds. i slowed down to turn onto briarwood drive to stop and get a better look. when i got out the lights kept moving then disappeared into the cloud cover.

while driving i used my iphone to capture video of the 4 lights.
i also noticed other people witnessing the same 4 lights.
content.summary: 4 glowing orange/red lights in the sky moving slowly

content.detailedDescription:
First, i see a lot of ufos on a regular basis. this one stands out by far.

at around 11:30 to 12:30, i was looking at the stars (as i usually do) and see a very faint, very dim light shooting across the sky. i was able to see the international space station a few weeks ago (california), and i think it travels around 17,000 mph. at that altitude, this ufo had to have been going at least 6-10 times the speed of the iss. i first saw it while looking at the normal constellations i see. i am looking basically straight up, and i see movement. i focus on the movement, and realize how fast it is going first. its very dim, and looks very large, almost as if i have an out of focus view on a star; but traveling at amazing speeds. i would say it would cross from horizon to horizon (maintained at an average speed) in less than 4 minutes. i've never seen any ufo travel so fast, and making it difficult to see makes me believe it's extra-terrestrial instead of government craft. this occurred for about 15 seconds, at which point it went dim and i could no longer see it (i have 20/20 vision and am far sighted, so i see these better than a lot of my friends). it seemed to have maneuvered to the south, but just barely. a small correction of flight trajectory, if you will. i had no emotions other than excitement and amazement that i was able to see this. my friend from inside heard me as i said in awe things along the lines of "what is that?" and "i've never seen any ufo do that" and came outside to see what i was saying. it disappeared shortly before that unfortunately. somewhat of an oval shape, but hard to distinguish. it looked very out of focus, and very dim.
content.summary: Fast moving star-like object traveling at incredible speeds from east to west.
